attributes.action: Make Public transport free for students in state schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose this petition as I have to travel a long way on public transport to get to my school. I pay each day and it adds up to an amount. I propose that we have specially made bus passes or free bus passes to get us to school daily.I have also found that people who don't have enough bus fare don't go to school and subsequently miss school for nothing.Some can't walk that far, and then tend to stray and go somewhere else.
